entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
